element.name: The (Incomplete) Annals of Aldebräis
element.description:
A companion book for games played in the world of Aeldebräis.

This supplement contains a variety of new content to be used in Dungeons & Dragons 5th Edition games, including new class options, creatures, deities, feats, items, magical items and artifacts, races, spells and more! Please note that it's a work in progress, and the content is subject to change.

Created and written by Thomas Beazer, and is still a work in progress!
